findings.title: Potential unauthorized script upgrade
findings.description: The finding indicates a potential vulnerability where an unauthorized user can upgrade the script, leading to unintended consequences.

findings.title: Transaction Limit
findings.description: Smart contract admin can change max transaction limit. The smart contract owner can change the value to 'zero'. No arbitrary limit set.

findings.title: Pause
findings.description: The pause functionality can be controlled by the owner, which may lead to unintended consequences if not properly managed.

findings.title: Renounce
findings.description: The owner of the contract has the capability to renounce ownership which can lead to a denial-of-service attack.
